details.title: Issue table generator
details.description: Generates a data table for the input agile issues.

inputendpoint.name: issues
inputendpoint.label: Issues
inputendpoint.description: The issues to be plotted on the table

outputendpoint.name: dataset
outputendpoint.label: Table Data Model
outputendpoint.description: A JSON or an object with two fields: structure (for the structure of the data) and data (the data ifself)
